title: 新约 - 彼得前书(1Peter) - 第 1 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 彼得前书(1Peter) -- 第 1 章 ( 本篇共有 5 章 )

lineList.en: Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, and Bithynia,
lineList.cn: 耶稣基督的使徒彼得，写信给那分散在本都，加拉太，加帕多家，亚细亚，庇推尼寄居的。

lineList.en: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ: Grace unto you, and peace, be multiplied.
lineList.cn: 就是照父神的先见被拣选，藉着圣灵得成圣洁，以致顺服耶稣基督，又蒙他血所洒的人。愿恩惠平安，多多的加给你们。

lineList.en: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,
lineList.cn: 愿颂赞归与我们的主耶稣基督的父神，他曾照自己的大怜悯，藉耶稣基督从死里复活重生了我们，教我们有活泼的盼望，

lineList.en: To an inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you,
lineList.cn: 可以得着不能朽坏，不能玷污，不能衰残，为你们存留在天上的基业。

lineList.en: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time.
lineList.cn: 你们这因信蒙神能力保守的人，必能得着所豫备，到末世要显现的救恩。

lineList.en: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations:
lineList.cn: 因此，你们是大有喜乐，但如今，在百般的试炼中暂时忧愁。

lineList.en: That the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:
lineList.cn: 叫你们的信心既被试验，就比那被火试验，仍然能坏的金子，更显宝贵。可以在耶稣基督显现的时候，得着称赞，荣耀，尊贵。

lineList.en: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:
lineList.cn: 你们虽然没有见过他，却是爱他。如今虽不得看见，却因信他就有说不出来，满有荣光的大喜乐。

lineList.en: Receiving the end of your faith, even the salvation of your souls.
lineList.cn: 并且得着你们信心的果效，就是灵魂的救恩。

lineList.en: Of which salvation the prophets have enquired and searched diligently, who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you:
lineList.cn: 论到这救恩，那豫先说你们要得恩典的众先知，早已详细的寻求考察。

lineList.en: Searching what, or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify, when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ, and the glory that should follow.
lineList.cn: 就是考察在他们心里基督的灵，豫先证明基督受苦难，后来得荣耀，是指着什么时候，并怎样的时候。

lineList.en: Unto whom it was revealed, that not unto themselves, but unto us they did minister the things, which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven; which things the angels desire to look into.
lineList.cn: 他们得了启示，知道他们所传讲的一切事（传讲原文作服事），不是为自己，乃是为你们。那靠着从天上差来的圣灵，传福音给你们的人，现在将这些事报给你们。天使也愿意详细察看这些事。

lineList.en: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;
lineList.cn: 所以要约束你们的心（原文作束上你们心中的腰），谨慎自守，专心盼望耶稣基督显现的时候所带来给你们的恩。

lineList.en: As obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance:
lineList.cn: 你们既作顺命的儿女，就不要效法从前蒙昧无知的时候，那放纵私欲的样子。

lineList.en: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation;
lineList.cn: 那召你们的既是圣洁，你们在一切所行的事上也要圣洁。

lineList.en: Because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.
lineList.cn: 因为经上记着说，你们要圣洁，因为我是圣洁的。

lineList.en: And if ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man's work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear:
lineList.cn: 你们既称那不偏待人，按各人行为审判人的主为父，就当存敬畏的心，度你们在世寄居的日子。

lineList.en: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers;
lineList.cn: 知道你们得救赎，脱去你们祖宗所传流虚妄的行为，不是凭着能坏的金银等物。

lineList.en: But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:
lineList.cn: 乃是凭着基督的宝血，如同无瑕疵无玷污的羔羊之血。

lineList.en: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world, but was manifest in these last times for you,
lineList.cn: 基督在创世以前，是豫先被神知道的，却在这末世，才为你们显现。

lineList.en: Who by him do believe in God, that raised him up from the dead, and gave him glory; that your faith and hope might be in God.
lineList.cn: 你们也因信着他，信那叫他从死里复活，又给他荣耀的神，叫你们的信心，和盼望，都在于神。

lineList.en: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently:
lineList.cn: 你们既因顺从真理，洁净了自己的心，以致爱弟兄没有虚假，就当从心里彼此切实相爱。从心里有古卷作从清洁的心

lineList.en: Being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们蒙了重生，不是由于能坏的种子，乃是由于不能坏的种子，是藉着神活泼常存的道。

lineList.en: For all flesh is as grass, and all the glory of man as the flower of grass. The grass withereth, and the flower thereof falleth away:
lineList.cn: 因为凡有血气的，尽都如草，他的美荣，都像草上的花。草必枯乾，花必凋谢。

lineList.en: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever. And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you.
lineList.cn: 惟有主的道是永存的。所传给你们的福音就是这道。
